DESCRIPTION: May only be played by paying the additional cost of #yExhausting #yKeys from your hand from left to right.
An enemy is Crippled if it has both #yWeak and #yVulnerable.
Hexxed creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.
If the enemy has #yWeak, apply #b1 #yVulnerable. If the enemy has #yVulnerable, apply #b1 #yWeak.
